segments.text: I would much rather see her once or twice and not do anything about it — — what could I about it anyway ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t say things like this . Please be confident . I think you still have the chance to win her love , unless you don ’ t love her anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t you think she is a bit out of my way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In some way , she is more modern .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I do try to do anything , I ’ d only be sent off with a flea in my ear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you really think so , in my opinion you should give up this feeling completely .
segments.speaker: S2
